text.text_translated: When we look at our things, we see that some are not used well. For example, we have a thick woollen coat. We thought it looked nice, but we live in a tropical country. Or we have an old smartphone. We do not use it after we buy a new one. Maybe we have a car, but we only use it at the weekends. Our house might have a guest room, but now it is a room to store things.
